name: Kali
description:
"Kali" or "Project Kali" is our semester project.  We are a group of Game Design students, residing in Berlin and during the past 7 weeks (as of 30th of August 2019) we realised this neat little slasher game for our portfolios.

We won't have a lot of time in the near future to further iterate on this project, as we're still engaged in our studies, but for feedback and criticism we are glad to share the result of our work. (For free, of course)

Feel free to share your opinion with us! Any constructive commentary is more than welcome!
